name: Chronoblade Edge
applies_to: All swords (wood through netherite, including modded smithing variants)

effects.summary: Consecutive strikes within 4s gain +6% melee damage and inflict a 5% slow for 1s.
Bonus increases to +10% (stacking twice) and adds bleed for 2 damage over 2s.
Bonus reaches +14% (stacking three times); bleed deals 3 damage over 3s and slow becomes 10% for 1.5s.
